name: Lemo\'s Duke3d Engine
short_description: Experimental 3D/FPS engine designed around DukeNukem3d file formats. Started from scratch (not a Build/Duke3d port), uses OpenGL, planned to work on both Windows and Unix variants (Linux, FreeBSD, ...)
